Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Fuel nozzle blockage. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 14/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
